origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SocialSecurityAPI.get_pension_details', 'description': 'This function provides details about the pension insurance based on the account type, beneficiary age, and years of contribution.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'accountType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of pension account, e.g., personal, employer.'}, {'name': 'beneficiaryAge', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The age of the beneficiary.'}, {'name': 'contributionYears', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years of contributions made to the pension account.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'details', 'description': 'The details of the pension insurance including contribution history, current balance, and projected benefits.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SocialSecurityAPI.get_pension_details, 它的参数输入如下: 'accountType'是'personal', 'beneficiaryAge'是'23', 'contributionYears'是'0'.
